attributes.action: British TV. Too many adverts, repeats and American TV. Nothing ever new
attributes.additional_details:
TV programmes just loop. So every few hours the same programme, recorded voice-over is played. Example: UK group (Dave/Gold/Really etc). They play on one channel, switch to another channel & play the same content there. ITV3/Channel 5 are the same.

Adverts are now 6 minutes long & Christmas time are longer. Its record the programme, fast forward the adverts (upto 1 min) then watch part 2 of the same repeat.
attributes.background: Cut the number of channels which just show repeats. Cut the number of American rubbish & get new British made content non-reality on our screens.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about licensing television channels are a matter for Ofcom, not the UK Government or Parliament.
